About Me

BIO

Operations. Coaching. Developing. Management. Hiring.

Joseph's 7 years of professional experience have molded him into a well-rounded, organized, and creative employee . With a History Degree from Whittier College, Joseph loves to research and examine the past in order to be better prepared for current projects. He also has a Full Stack Development Certificate from The University of Texas. Beginning in the Fall of 2021, Joseph will be pursuing an Master of Public Administration from the University of Pittsburgh.

Onboarding and Recruiting Manager

KitchenSync: 2019-2020

• Sourced and interviewed candidates for over 40 restaurants nationwide.
• Envisioned, created, and maintained software and back-end programming that improved the onboarding process.
• Researched best practices.
• Administered benefits; enrolled eligible employees in Healthcare systems.

Technical Recruiter

Trilogy Education: May 2018-Jan 2019

• Sourced employees using platforms such as LinkedIn and Angel List.
• Used tools such as Excel, ADP, LinkedIn Recruiter.

Shift Supervisor

Austin Bouldering Project: June 2015- Oct 2017

• Interviewed, hired, and trained new employees.
• Responsible for day-to-day facility operations including staff management, membership processing, facility tours, retail sales, and merchandising.
• Planned and organized special events, including Southwest Boulderfest.

Admission Counselor

Linfield College: June 2013- May 2015

• Utilized data analytic techniques, database manipulation strategies, and excel to formulate recruitment plans.
• Created relationships with students, parents, and school counselors.
• Contributed to coordination of recruitment events
